meta.label: Slack User Resolver
meta.description: Resolves Slack user IDs to usernames and emails in a dataset of Slack messages.

inputRoles.name: input_dataset
inputRoles.label: Slack Messages Input
inputRoles.description: Dataset containing Slack messages with user IDs to resolve

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: Resolved Users Output
outputRoles.description: Dataset with user IDs resolved to usernames and emails

params.name: columns_to_resolve
params.label: User ID Columns to Resolve
params.description: Select columns containing user IDs to resolve. Default: 'user', 'reply_users'

params.name: resolve_user
params.label: Resolve 'user' column
params.description: Resolve the 'user' column to get usernames and emails

params.name: user_name_column
params.label: Output Column for User Names
params.description: Column name to store resolved user names

params.name: user_email_column
params.label: Output Column for User Emails
params.description: Column name to store resolved user emails

params.name: resolve_reply_users
params.label: Resolve 'reply_users' column
params.description: Resolve the 'reply_users' column to get user information for thread replies

params.name: reply_users_info_column
params.label: Output Column for Reply Users Info
params.description: Column name to store resolved reply users information

params.name: logging_level
params.label: Logging Level
params.description: The level of logging that the recipe generates.
